GapFillDragDrop.Title: Comparative and superlative adjectives
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct answer into each gap.

Content.Question:
1. My birthday's on the same day as my mother's.
2. My sister's younger than me.
3. Penelope looks like her grandmother.
4. Our daughter's the best in her class.
5. Ewa's glasses are similar to mine.
6. Your hands are smaller than mine.
7. Our children are very different from each other.
8. I look like my older sister.
9. Your shoes are the same as mine.
10. My brother's eyes are similar to mine.
